Muimiranji patali, Yehova?Mubisaliranji m'nyengo za nsautso?
Podzikuza woipa apsereza waumphawi;agwe m'chiwembu anapanganacho.
Pakuti woipa adzitamira chifuniro cha moyo wake,adalitsa wosirira, koma anyoza Yehova.
Woipa, monga mwa kudzikuza kwa nkhope yake, akuti, Sadzafunsira.Malingaliro ake onse akuti, Palibe Mulungu.
Mayendedwe ake alimbika nthawi zonse;maweruzo anu ali pamwamba posaona iye;adani ake onse awanyodola.
Ati mumtima mwake, Sindidzagwedezeka ine;ku mibadwomibadwo osagwa m'tsoka ine.
M'kamwa mwake mwadzala kutembererandi manyengo ndi kuchenjerera;pansi pa lilime lake pali chivutitso chopanda pake.
Akhala m'molalira midzi;mobisalamo akupha munthu wosachimwa.Ambisira waumphawi nkhope yake.
Alalira monga mkango m'ngaka mwake;alalira kugwira wozunzika,agwira wozunzika, pakumkola m'ukonde mwake.
Aunthama, nawerama,ndipo aumphawi agwa m'zala zake.
Anena m'mtima mwake, Mulungu waiwala;wabisa nkhope yake; sapenya nthawi zonse.
Ukani, Yehova; samulani dzanja lanu, Mulungu;musaiwale ozunzika.
Woipa anyozeranji Mulungu,anena m'mtima mwake, Simudzafunsira?
Mwapenya; pakuti mumayang'anira chivutitsondi chisoni kuti achipereke m'manja mwanu;waumphawi adzipereka kwa Inu;wamasiye mumakhala mthandizi wake.
Thyolani mkono wa woipa;ndipo wochimwa, mutsate choipa chakekufikira simuchipezanso china.
Yehova ndiye Mfumu kunthawi yamuyaya;aonongeka amitundu m'dziko lake.
Yehova, mwamva chikhumbo cha ozunzika,mudzakhazikitsa mtima wao, mudzatchereza khutu lanu;
kuti muweruze mlandu wa amasiye ndi wokhalira mphanthi,kuti munthu wa pa dziko lapansi angaonjeze kuopsa.
